engine.components

Class LightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.core.entity.EntityComponent
      • engine.components.LightComponent

  • public class LightComponent
extends EntityComponent
    Casts a dynamic light on the entity and nearby entities.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • LightComponent

        public LightComponent(Entity entity,
              LightMap light,
              double width,
              double height,
              double offsetX,
              double offsetY)
        Creates a new LightComponent
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity this component is attached to.
        light - The light to be cast.
        width - How wide of an area the light is cast over, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        height - How tall of an area the light is cast over, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        offsetX - How much the light is offset from the center of the entity on X.
        offsetY - How much the light is offset from the center of the entity on Y.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(IRenderContext target,
          double viewportX,
          double viewportY)
        Description copied from class: EntityComponent
        Renders this component.
        Overrides:
        render in class EntityComponent
        Parameters:
        target - The context being used for rendering
        viewportX - The location of the viewport on X.
        viewportY - The location of the viewport on Y.

      • setIntensity

        public void setIntensity(double amt)
        Sets the intensity of the light
        Parameters:
        amt - How intense the light is, where 0.0 is none and 1.0 is full.
